mapper.select: select count(*) from coupon_list where heart_no=#{heartNo}

select * from heart h join member m on h.member_no=m.member_no left outer join coupon_list cl on h.heart_no=cl.heart_no left outer join coupon c on cl.coupon_no=c.coupon_no where h.course_no=#{courseNo}
and h.heart_no=(select min(heart_no ) from heart where course_no=#{courseNo})
and h.heart_no>(select min(heart_no ) from heart where course_no=#{courseNo})
order by h.heart_no
select * from coupon order by coupon_no
